short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings a touch of calm and serenity to every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring a soothing background of soft, blue petals, this extension provides a relaxing and pleasant visual experience for users. The combination of gentle light and cool tones from the flowers creates a tranquil atmosphere, helping you stay focused and at ease while browsing.

Key features:
- Beautiful background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
